name: Shakkoumon
effect: [When Digivolving] If you have 5 or fewer security cards, ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞. (Place the top card of your deck on top of your security stack.) Then, when DNA digivolving, return 1 of your opponent's Digimon whose level is less than or equal to the number of cards in your security stack to its owner's hand.
digivolve_effect: [When Attacking] 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -3000 DP for the turn.
